expand.description: Expand options that include additional issue details in the response.

self.description: The URL of the issue details.

renderedFields.description: The rendered value of each field present on the issue.

properties.description: Details of the issue properties identified in the request.

names.description: The ID and name of each field present on the issue.

schema.description: The schema describing each field present on the issue.

transitions.description: The transitions that can be performed on the issue.

operations.description: The operations that can be performed on the issue.

editmeta.description: The metadata for the fields on the issue that can be amended.

changelog.description: Details of changelogs associated with the issue.

versionedRepresentations.description: The versions of each field on the issue.
